name: Brick Car Crash Online
description:
Drive a racing, toy car consisting of multi-colored blocks.
You are given complete, freedom of action on a perfectly destructible machine, in completely open locations.
  Perform crazy stunts on ramps and jumps while trying to minimize damage to your car.
  Take part in crazy car battles, along with friends in multiplayer or single player.
 - Unlock and upgrade new cars, getting points in battles or performing tricks, as well as collecting coins.
 ⁃ Cars are completely broken into blocks.
 ⁃ A variety of locations with many springboards.
 ⁃ Play multiplayer with friends
  Brick Car Smash Online 2020 will give you and your friends a lot of bright, unforgettable emotions!
